label: README Location Check
description: Validates that README.md files exist in expected locations of a repository. Uses README paths discovered by a previous fetchFromGithub step (fetchType: "path"). You can optionally supply expected paths or patterns (exact paths or regex-like patterns) to enforce specific locations.
rationale: Ensures projects are documented in discoverable, conventional locations (root/docs/packages/apps/src).

requiresPrevious.message: This operator must follow fetchFromGithub with fetchType: "path" so README paths are available.

paths.description: Optional list of expected README locations. Each item can be an exact path (e.g., "README.md", "docs/README.md") or a regex-like pattern (e.g., "packages/.*/README.md", ".*/README.md").
